uvi.description:
usbnet: sanity check for maxpacket

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.77 by commit 693ecbe8f799405f8775719deedb1f76265d375a. For more details please see the references link.
